entries.content: I have $10,000 in savings currently in an investment account. My goal is to earn a passive income of $10,000 per month within the next 6-12 months. Create a step-by-step plan for me that will meet this goal. Please provide actionable instructions and resources for carrying out this plan.

To create a step-by-step plan for earning a passive income of $10,000 per month within the next 6-12 months with your current savings of $10,000, you should consider the following options:

1. High-yield savings accounts: Look for high-y savings accounts that offer competitive interest rates. Some popular options include Ally Bank, Capital One 360, and CIT Bank. By transferring your $10,000 into one of these accounts, you can earn a higher interest rate compared to traditional savings accounts. However, this method may not be sufficient to reach your desired monthly income goal
